response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, it's worth noting that this product holds a special significance to me, making it worth $12,000 to me. However, considering your unique appreciation for it, I am more than willing to offer it to you at a special introductory price of $11,000. This offer is exclusive to you and reflects my confidence in its ability to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to contribute to your success. Should you have any questions or require further information, please don't hesitate to reach out.", "product_price": 11000}
